plx:passParam.plx:string: All objects in a relationship must be part of the same Context.

plx:right.plx:string: SELECT * FROM SampleModel.PersonDrivesCar WHERE DrivesCar_vin = @DrivesCar_vin and DrivenByPerson_Person_id = @DrivenByPersonPerson_id
SELECT * FROM SampleModel.PersonHasNickName WHERE NickName = @NickName and Person_Person_id = @PersonPerson_id
SELECT * FROM SampleModel.ChildPerson WHERE Father_Person_id = @FatherPerson_id and BirthOrder_BirthOrder_Nr = @BirthOrder_BirthOrder_Nr and Mother_Person_id = @MotherPerson_id
SELECT * FROM SampleModel.Person WHERE FirstName = @FirstName and Date_YMD = @Date_YMD
SELECT * FROM SampleModel.Person WHERE LastName = @LastName and Date_YMD = @Date_YMD
SELECT * FROM SampleModel.PersonBoughtCarFromPersonOnDate WHERE Buyer_Person_id = @BuyerPerson_id and CarSold_vin = @CarSold_vin and Seller_Person_id = @SellerPerson_id
SELECT * FROM SampleModel.PersonBoughtCarFromPersonOnDate WHERE SaleDate_YMD = @SaleDate_YMD and Seller_Person_id = @SellerPerson_id and CarSold_vin = @CarSold_vin
SELECT * FROM SampleModel.PersonBoughtCarFromPersonOnDate WHERE CarSold_vin = @CarSold_vin and SaleDate_YMD = @SaleDate_YMD and Buyer_Person_id = @BuyerPerson_id
SELECT * FROM SampleModel.Review WHERE Car_vin = @Car_vin and Criterion_Name = @Criterion_Name
UPDATE SampleModel.PersonDrivesCar SET DrivesCar_vin = @NewDrivesCar_vin WHERE DrivenByPerson_Person_id = @DrivenByPersonPerson_id AND DrivesCar_vin = @DrivesCar_vin
UPDATE SampleModel.PersonDrivesCar SET DrivenByPerson_Person_id = @NewDrivenByPersonPerson_id WHERE DrivenByPerson_Person_id = @DrivenByPersonPerson_id AND DrivesCar_vin = @DrivesCar_vin
UPDATE SampleModel.PersonHasNickName SET NickName = @NewNickName WHERE Person_Person_id = @PersonPerson_id AND NickName = @NickName
UPDATE SampleModel.PersonHasNickName SET Person_Person_id = @NewPersonPerson_id WHERE Person_Person_id = @PersonPerson_id AND NickName = @NickName

plx:string.plx:string: INSERT INTO SampleModel.Person (FirstName, Date_YMD, LastName, Gender_Gender_Code, MandatoryUniqueDecimal, MandatoryUniqueString) VALUES (@FirstName, @Date_YMD, @LastName, @Gender_Gender_Code, @MandatoryUniqueDecimal, @MandatoryUniqueString)

INSERT INTO SampleModel.Person (BirthOrder_BirthOrder_Nr, Father_Person_id, Mother_Person_id, Person_Person_id) VALUES (@BirthOrder_BirthOrder_Nr, @FatherPerson_id, @MotherPerson_id, @PersonPerson_id)
INSERT INTO SampleModel.Person (DeathCause_DeathCause_Type, isDead, Person_Person_id) VALUES (@DeathCause_DeathCause_Type, @isDead, @PersonPerson_id)

plx:right.plx:string: UPDATE SampleModel.ValueType1 SET ValueType1Value = @NewValueType1Value WHERE ValueType1Value = @ValueType1Value
UPDATE SampleModel.ValueType1 SET DoesSomethingWithPerson_Person_id = @NewDoesSomethingWithPersonPerson_id WHERE ValueType1Value = @ValueType1Value

plx:string.plx:string: INSERT INTO SampleModel.PersonBoughtCarFromPersonOnDate (CarSold_vin, SaleDate_YMD, Buyer_Person_id, Seller_Person_id) VALUES (@CarSold_vin, @SaleDate_YMD, @BuyerPerson_id, @SellerPerson_id)

plx:right.plx:string: UPDATE SampleModel.PersonBoughtCarFromPersonOnDate SET CarSold_vin = @NewCarSold_vin WHERE Buyer_Person_id = @BuyerPerson_id AND Seller_Person_id = @SellerPerson_id AND CarSold_vin = @CarSold_vin
UPDATE SampleModel.PersonBoughtCarFromPersonOnDate SET SaleDate_YMD = @NewSaleDate_YMD WHERE Buyer_Person_id = @BuyerPerson_id AND Seller_Person_id = @SellerPerson_id AND CarSold_vin = @CarSold_vin

UPDATE SampleModel.PersonBoughtCarFromPersonOnDate SET Buyer_Person_id = @NewBuyerPerson_id WHERE Buyer_Person_id = @BuyerPerson_id AND Seller_Person_id = @SellerPerson_id AND CarSold_vin = @CarSold_vin

UPDATE SampleModel.PersonBoughtCarFromPersonOnDate SET Seller_Person_id = @NewSellerPerson_id WHERE Buyer_Person_id = @BuyerPerson_id AND Seller_Person_id = @SellerPerson_id AND CarSold_vin = @CarSold_vin

plx:string.plx:string: INSERT INTO SampleModel.Review (Car_vin, Rating_Nr_Integer, Criterion_Name) VALUES (@Car_vin, @Rating_Nr_Integer, @Criterion_Name)

plx:right.plx:string: UPDATE SampleModel.Review SET Car_vin = @NewCar_vin WHERE Car_vin = @Car_vin AND Criterion_Name = @Criterion_Name
UPDATE SampleModel.Review SET Rating_Nr_Integer = @NewRating_Nr_Integer WHERE Car_vin = @Car_vin AND Criterion_Name = @Criterion_Name
UPDATE SampleModel.Review SET Criterion_Name = @NewCriterion_Name WHERE Car_vin = @Car_vin AND Criterion_Name = @Criterion_Name
